Activity: Log in to the EHR system, check for any urgent patient messages or updates. Review the standardized protocols for influenza symptom assessment.
Begin patient rounds, focusing on assessing for influenza symptoms using the standardized protocols. Document findings in the EHR.
Administer influenza vaccinations to scheduled patients. Ensure all vaccination details are accurately entered into the EHR.
Continue patient rounds and influenza symptom assessments. Cross-check EHR entries for completeness and accuracy.
Meet with @rn-1 and @rn-2 to discuss any challenges in symptom assessment or EHR documentation.
Review the day's EHR entries for any discrepancies or missing information. Update as necessary.
